Name: Haunting of the Evil Spirit - Horror Choose your own adventure Novel
About the game: Horror Visual Novel Set in a haunted house, with multiple puzzles, paths, and endings. And great atmospheric music. Choices are forgiving and let you go back without replaying big chunks of the game. reads Like An Interactive Book. approximately 3 Hours Of Content.
